Maloriak is relatively simple encounter

For healers, Maloriak is relatively simple encounter in comparison to the fights we discussed in previous weeks. The easiest way to examine the fight as a healer is to break down the encounter by phases. Should you be using Mind Sear in your daily heroics right now with any kind of regularity? it is probable notThere are multiple reasons why Mind Sear with WOW GOLD is a near-useless spell. It is a 5-second channel, with ticks coming every second. That may sound good, but each of those ticks hit like a wet noodle -- often less than 0.5% of a trash mob total health. Unlike Mind Flay, Mind Sears damage output is not increased by stacks of Evangelism. And worst of all, despite all its faults, Mind Sear is damn expensive to use: A single cast of Mind Sear eats up 5,765 mana at level 85, more than any other spell we cast.

There was nothing against sarcasm

A follow up with real info does take the edge off, but if you want to kid around, why not save those comments for technically savvy questions? At least those people know the game and won't be easily intimidated. And I really feel sorry for people trying to look up info about WoW online these days, because with all the expansions, there is a ton of out-of-date info. If it doesn't have a patch number or a date you can't be sure about something like WOW Gold in game, but a new player doesn't know to look for that. These free starter accounts aren't helping Blizzard any, either, so many things they can't do. The established players have no awareness of that--I had a friend try a starter account, she didn't end up staying, and once I started to look into all the stuff they couldn't do, I realized I gave her all the wrong advice.
